name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Quality Assurance Engineer with 13+ years of experience ensuring high-performance application delivery in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in leveraging **C#**, **Java**, **Unity**, **iOS**, and **Android** technologies to enhance software quality. Skilled in automating testing processes using **AWS Device Farm**, **Kobiton**, and **Unity Test Runner**, while implementing robust CI/CD strategies with **Jenkins** and **Azure DevOps**. Expertise in debugging and problem-solving to identify and resolve issues efficiently. Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively within cross-functional teams. Additionally, well-versed in compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring alignment with regulatory requirements while maintaining application integrity.
